name: MiniRPG (Ludum Dare 45)
description:
Hey! I made this game in 48 hours for my first game jam, Ludum Dare 45. Your goal is to collect a lot of items and bring them back to your house. The theme was 'start with nothing'. I ran into a few problems along the way (like build times over an hour) and that's why there's barely any audio. All the audio was added in literally the last 5 minutes. Also it might be a bit buggy, sorry about that! But ignoring all of that, I hope you have a fun time playing MiniRPG! (it's an RPG but mini, get it?)

CONTROLS

  1. A-D/LEFT-RIGHT TO MOVE
  2. M1 TO SHOOT BOW
  3. UP/W TO JUMP WITH SLIME POWER

CHANGELOG

10.6.2019

  1.  Changed the display icon for the exe. It was originally very low-res, and it really annoyed me.
